alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:26AM HST until November 28 at 10:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 10 AM HST THIS MORNING... .An area of deep moisture will continue to move over the Big Island this morning, bringing periods of snow and freezing for to the highest elevations. Temperatures are expected to climb above freezing by mid to late morning, bringing a mix of rain and snow showers to the summits. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM HST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Periods of snow and freezing fog. * WHERE...Big Island Summits above 12,500 feet. * WHEN...Until 10 AM HST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on dangerously slippery road conditions and limited visibilities.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
